visualizerParams.title: Even Number Filter Logic Flaw
visualizerParams.problemDescription: The `get_even_numbers` function is intended to extract all even numbers from a given list. However, when run with a list of mixed numbers, it seems to be returning a list of odd numbers instead. Identify and fix the logic error that causes this incorrect filtering, ensuring it correctly gathers only the even numbers.

solution.explanation: The bug was a subtle logic flaw in the condition used to identify even numbers. The original buggy code used `num % 2 != 0`, which incorrectly checks if a number is *not* even (i.e., odd). To correctly filter for even numbers, the condition must explicitly check if the remainder when divided by 2 is exactly 0. Changing the condition to `num % 2 == 0` ensures that only numbers perfectly divisible by 2 are added to the `evens` list.
